feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: I never give up anything that I choose to do.

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: What original notions you clever men have!

causedByEvent.name: Lydgate's suggestion of buying wedding clothes after marriage

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: An unmistakable delight shone forth from the blue eyes that met his.

causedByEvent.name: Lydgate's proposal of a speedy marriage

feels.name: Anticipation
feels.quote: I could certainly hasten the work.

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: She looked at her lover with some wondering remonstrance as she spoke.

causedByEvent.name: Lydgate's earnest pleading for a quick marriage

feels.name: Annoyance
feels.quote: It is too late now for your father to say that our engagement must be given up.

feels.name: Disapproval
feels.quote: I never give up anything that I choose to do.
